Emergency Management. Public Safety. Disaster Preparedness. Business Continuity. Hazmatician. Amateur Radio: N3FUD. GMRS: WRTY997. Photographer. Communicator. Educator. Computer Geek, Creator, Music lover. IEMBot Weather Feed publisher. 3D printing novice.
